To replicate our work, the following general steps should be taken.
These steps assume that researchers have Python and R programming environments downloaded and running on their systems.

Furthermore, these steps assume that researchers have downloaded all attachments associated with this protocol \(see attached zip files) and have extracted the files from those attachments to a single local repository on their computer systems \(e.g., a single file location).
Replace file directories in Python code to local directories on your system.
Download all data sets associated with this protocol.
Replace file directories in R code to the local directories in which data were downloaded in Step 1.
